77a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
77a4(khri brgyad): / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes so// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
77a5(khri brgyad): bre shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
77a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la snyan par yang mi bgyid/ gnod par mi bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// 
77a7(khri brgyad): bus gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/ gnod par 'ang mi bgyid pa lag pa/ bcom ldan
77b1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang mi byed/ gnod par yang mi byed du// 
77b2(khri brgyad): ri'i bus gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi ros// byin parnam par dag pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ shA ri'i du
77b3(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags/ 
77b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra'i bu chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ 
77b5(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
77b6(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du/ bdag rnam par dag pas/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyim bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa ni shin tu rnam par dkapa yin
77b7(khri brgyad): no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i skad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes bya ram par dag pa lags so// macom ldan
77b8(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag / rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
78a1(khri brgyad): bIr dag pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slang du/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson grus dang / bsam gtan ngo/ shes rab kyi
78a2(khri brgyad): na pa rnam par dag pa lags so// bco ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i sred de/ drin pa nye bar ga nag pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag dam par dag
78a3(khri brgyad): drud du/ yang+gA sa pa'i rung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rka ba dang / dbang po dang / ltab pa dang / byangams kyi yan la ga sa pa mas rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
78a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgya 'i chol ma 'dres pa rab rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byas gsal
78a5(khri brgyad): chom ldan dab ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshas thams cad rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag ma pa byor
78b1(khri brgyad): sa rgyas kyi tshum lams cad med ni shes rnam yinano// rab 'byor gyis gsus pa/ bco du 'das pa dganas par da/  nga / tsun dum
78b2(khri brgyad): dgapa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dbazhin du ba marnam par das pa'i slang du/ lan gyis phyi ma pa'i 'bras pang/ phyi mi stong ba'i 'grus bu de/  mus nyi nga/ 
78b3(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gamal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i srad du/ bdag rma
78b4(khri brgyad): dga'as/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang / bdag rnam par dag pas/ lan cig nyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra btsam pa nyid dang / 
78b5(khri brgyad): chub rnam par dgi pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slang du
78b6(khri brgyad): byang chub rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ 'al/  'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi ro// rab sa gsolal/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slang du/ ba
78b7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas/ byang chub rnam par dag pa legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsal la/ bcom ldan 'das
78b8(khri brgyad): bad rnam par dga'i phreng du/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis pas 'asum pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi ro// 
79a1(khri brgyad): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
79a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor shes pa ma rnyed ma sbyor ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa ni thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa
79a3(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gnyis su ma
79a4(khri brgyad): mchis shing / rnam par dag pa thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang
79a5(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs su ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
79a6(khri brgyad): spel pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad du/ bdag sum mchis pas/ gzugs sum mas sh-i / 
79a7(khri brgyad): par dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid deng / thog mdang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
79a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das bdag sum mchis pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes la su mamachis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas/ 
79b1(khri brgyad): ra'abyor shin tu sa pa dag // rab gyur gyis gsalapa/ bcom ldan 'a srad du/ bag su mchis pas/ tsho bad/ 'du shes / 2sh-id rnam
79b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mams shing / rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 
79b3(khri brgyad): 'byer gyis gsol hA/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
79b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan
79b5(khri brgyad): 'i shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gso la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
79b6(khri brgyad): sem 'a bems pa 'itsha po sa kyi shes rab kyi sa sbyin pa ni tshul kyi thus 'am/ ma kyi ma/ nyi gas mchis pa la yang mi migs pa lags/ tsaSh+Ta
79b7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
79b8(khri brgyad): nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshu ros kyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol kyi 'gram 'am/ gnyi ga ma mchis pa la yang mi dmigs pa legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ rab 'byor dus gsum
80a1(khri brgyad): nyam nyid gyur// na n+ya gyis gsapapa/ com ldan 'as pa tshig rgyan pa ma gas kyi thal yinas mo pa pas mim / shes
80a2(khri brgyad): pa dmarnapa 'i sa kyi shesas nan/ ni shes kyi kyin pag rdzus ldanapas// shel gyi kyis kyang sa sa kyi
80a3(khri brgyad): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so lags so// rab 'byor de de bzhin te de de bzhin no// ming du yang chags/ mtshan mar yang chags te/ rab
80a4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ming med pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming du yang chags pa lags/ mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
80a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du yang 'dzin par byed/ mtshan mar yang 'dzin par byed cing / med dang
80a6(khri brgyad): tshan ma bzung nas shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la rloms mas su byed de/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sem po su byed pas/ shes rab kyi ros tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byes
80a7(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang / chags pa dang / ma chags pa 'di da/ 
80a8(khri brgyad): lag ga cong shin la bar gtugs pa na cher bgasas// dem che nga ldan pa shA'i thug/ nga ldan pa 'byor ba 'dzin // tsam na pa sa kya byang chub mam
80b1(khri brgyad): dpa' khrims pa 'a chad sngonams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa ni gang yid/ mchags pa ni gang yin/ rab byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di sa byang chub sems dpa' thag pa pa
80b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi pa mo thabs la mi mkhas pa gzugs stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// nor ba dang / 'du shed dang / 'du byed rnam pa dang / rnam par shes pa stod zhes bya bar 'du shes na
80b3(khri brgyad): chags pa yin no// kham pa rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la yang de bzhin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// 
80b4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / bArtan 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sto zhes bya ba 'du shes na chags pa yin no// de bzhin du dran pa nye ba shan
80b5(khri brgyad): shes na chags pa yin no// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i slong bdang rdzu phrul kyi la dang / ba po dang / stobs da / byang chub kyi yim pa ga dang / la nga / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sasu yang dag par rig pa
80b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chosapa 'dres pa dang / rnam thams cad ma khyen pa nyid stod zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// che ldan pa shA 'i gzhan yang byang chub sems pa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu ma
80b7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin na// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma'ongs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// da ltar
80b8(khri brgyad): la/ datu yu sa ni bya ba pa du shes na gas pa minan//  sa zug zhan nga byang chu ma 'i'ig ris kyi bu ma ma ma
81a1(khri brgyad): chad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la don chags pa yin no// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi rol tu
81a2(khri brgyad): pa la spyod na chags pa yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stabs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag / 
81a3(khri brgyad): pa yin no// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa yin no// tshe dang
81a4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa po spyad pa'i ma chags pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
81a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mams pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du gzugs kyis gzugs kun tu mi shes so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par/ 
81a6(khri brgyad): shrIs las ma par shes pa kun tu mi shes so// 'das pa ma rnams kyi chos rnams kun tu mi shes so// mayongs pa'i chos 'ams kyis ma 'od 'i tshes rnams kun du mi shes sa// de lta byung
81a7(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so snyam du mi sems so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi
81a8(khri brgyad): khyims smras ni/ mi nyi mi nyid dang / bye nga pa nyid dang / phyim zung nyid par stong pa nyid pa nyid dang chen po nyi dang / do dpa pa ltas nyi dang / 'dus byas snyos nyi dang / 'dul
81b1(khri brgyad): pas stong pa nyid dang / bza' las 'ad la stong pa nyid dang / thogs dang tha ma med pa stong panyid dang / dor ba med pabastong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin spong pa nyid dang / tshong thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid tu
81b2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid dang / nga ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa 'ang bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// 'dis sbyin par bya/ 
81b3(khri brgyad): patshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brdzun 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab sgom par bya'o// shes di ba sgom par bya'o// na sor ba 'di lta
81b4(khri brgyad): bsrem par bya'o zhwa'am/ bdag gis bsad nams phul bar byed pa'o// bsod nams 'di rnam par bya'o// bsod nams 'di ltar spel bar bya'o zhe'am/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'dun
81b5(khri brgyad): pa'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o// bdag ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o// bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'o snyam du sems te/ 
81b6(khri brgyad): tshedang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la sa bdag la ni de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa dag medod// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i ba de dag
81b7(khri brgyad): nini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
81b8(khri brgyad): ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
82a1(khri brgyad): kun tu shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab tu kun tu shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du kun tu shes pa dang / 
82a2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun du shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mos yang dag par rig rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su kun
82a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su kun du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun tu shes pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ 
82a4(khri brgyad): dmed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa ste/ de ni chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so// 
82a5(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni yongs su bsngo bar mi nus la/ kau shi ka tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngobar
82a6(khri brgyad): yu shed/ de bzhin du rnam pa mas cad khyenas nyid kyi bar byo bzhin yang yongs sngalar tshu phyir // kau sho ka gzhan tha~Mr med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzhan de/ 
82a7(khri brgyad): ston par 'dod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i yid kyis yang dag par bstan par bya
82a8(khri brgyad): dzin du su pa bya/ yang dag pa ga pa byu pa bya/ yang dag par ju ga bang zhing/ sbyin pa'i la tu phyin ma rgyas tshe/ cem kyang bdag ni rkye kyi pa myed pa'o// bad
82b1(khri brgyad): kyi ldang s+ho// bdagan da sapa'o// ba na lam lus ma//  gan pasam gtan marnas pa gyu 'o//  'a 'anal// bdag nan nga shid la'ona'o// 'ad 'i
82b2(khri brgyad): dngos po yod pa'i ngas nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'o// bdag ni byang chub kyi phyog kyi chos sum du rtsa bdun sgom pa'o// bdag ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'o// snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag pa
82b3(khri brgyad): bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang da ltaragazhan dag la yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzer bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar skye
82b4(khri brgyad): na/ bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/ de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gzhan dag
82b5(khri brgyad): dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par gze bstod par bya/ yang dag pa rab tu dga' ba sh+yaste/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi del chags
82b6(khri brgyad): thams cad yongs su spong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshod ldan par 'akyi la bka' snga la/ rab 'byor ga/  khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i ma di dag ra
82b7(khri brgyad): chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba gzhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par bya/ de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yang la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tsheng
82b8(khri brgyad): ldan par 'byor gyi bcom ldan la sa de bzhin no nas gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lta tan pa dang / bco ldan das kyis 'di na ces bka' sa te// rang 'byor 'dil blanamed pa yang dgang 'dzags pa'i
83a1(khri brgyad): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi yum rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ de zhin gshegs la can kyar yi sa byed na/ ra 'byor mamadu mtshan mar med pa byed padarnam
83a2(khri brgyad): chagang ba yin no// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi lugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / 
83a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid
83a4(khri brgyad): nas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa 'ams
83a5(khri brgyad): ca dang bral ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang / de las gzhan pa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mtshan me yid la byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
83a6(khri brgyad): btu ljongs su sngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// de ci'i byor zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshan mar yid la bya
83a7(khri brgyad): de dag las gzhan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
83a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
83b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sha byas shing mngon par 'dus pa
83b2(khri brgyad): byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang yang na par rdzogs pa rtogs par mi nus so// rab 'byor gyi se gsam pa/ com ldan 'das ma mams cad ni mngon par rdzogs par rtags par dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan
83b3(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no// gang rang
83b4(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pos de ltar rang bzhin gcig pa dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / 
83b5(khri brgyad): dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na/ chags pa'i mtha 'thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dga'
83b6(khri brgyad): ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong mthos shing bye brag ma byed de/ rnam par ma shes la mngon par
83b7(khri brgyad): bar khong du ma chud pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gos lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyes pe khyab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rnam pa/ 
83b8(khri brgyad): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyang mi shes pa ste/ gzugs kyis mi shes so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas mi shes so// khams dang
84a1(khri brgyad): skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyis mi shes so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi
84a2(khri brgyad): mi shes so// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa pa so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs kyis kyi cho ya 'dres pa rnams kyis mi shes pa// shes rab kyi 'a rol// sbyin ba'i
84a3(khri brgyad): stong ba las/ chos thams cad rnam par dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
84a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bgyid pa'i lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad dmigs su med pa
84a5(khri brgyad): da pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spya par bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das shes
84a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
84a7(khri brgyad): la spyod pa yin no// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mo spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams
84a8(khri brgyad): dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong ba nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs na
84b1(khri brgyad): dang / mi 'dzegs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag mi spyod na/ shes
84b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no// 2 te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces byal mi spyod na shes rol tu phyin pa spyod pa yin no// kal te gzugs pade zhes
84b3(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de
84b4(khri brgyad): gal te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bye bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
84b5(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes ra'i kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ 
84b6(khri brgyad): me rtog pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag zhas/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med la/ gang rtag pa'am/ mau dag pa'am/ bdag la
84b7(khri brgyad): sdug 'asngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba deg bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang med cing / de bzhin du
85a1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i na/ gal te gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ longs
85a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'am longs
85a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bang du yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs sum rdzogs pa zhes
85a4(khri brgyad): ra mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta
85a5(khri brgyad): yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin la/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs sum rdzogs
85a6(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin zhing / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su
85a7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa 'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma yin no zhes bya ba da ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i bye
85a8(khri brgyad): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chags pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa
85b1(khri brgyad): dug/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsungs pa ni po mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de de bzhin na
85b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa dag legs par bshad do// 
85b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yon
85b4(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha roladu tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// mig chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes pa
85b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyad na/ nes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha por tu byin padakras da ga bya bar mi spyod
85b6(khri brgyad): / shes pa kyis 'du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa zhes bya ba mi spyod// shes rab kyi
85b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chol ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad ma
85b8(khri brgyad): banyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltar spyod pa ni gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya ba
86a1(khri brgyad): dam pa mas cad pakhyen pa nyid kyi du chags pa med pa nas byab 'dushes pa med do// rgyun du thugs pa thas su dang /  cig phyir rang
86a2(khri brgyad): na pa'i rgya dngas su dgug da la lags to// ldan 'das san pa
86a3(khri brgyad): ga la da mtha mazhes so// na da nas kya med ldan pa 'a
86b1(khri brgyad): 'i skyes bu la 'i 'phags pa brjod kyang shAphel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/ bsngags pa \u0f7f/ rjes su rgyag pa med ba sngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khong khrob med do// 
86b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bshad kyang de bzhin la/ ma bshad kyang de bzhin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
86b3(khri brgyad): chechen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa na/ zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang / bla na med
86b4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang slar mi ldogs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa
86b5(khri brgyad): mkha' sgom pa lags te/ nam mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par
86b6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang
86b7(khri brgyad): mamachis/ nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid kyang ma mchis// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ yang dag ste
86b8(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / spobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyang ma mchis/ nam mkha' lan stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / 
87a1(khri brgyad): ldang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bum mchib/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong
87a2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang ma mchis/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das bya
87a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha'i slad du brtson par 'chal ba dang / 'bad par 'tshal ba dang / rtsol bar 'tshal ba la
87a4(khri brgyad): so/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems cad rnams kye slad du kau 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'chal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
87a5(khri brgyad): gang dag gis rnam mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi slad du/ kau cha 'tshal ba de dag ni kau chen po 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha chen po
87a6(khri brgyad): bdadag ni nam mkha' bar snang la brdeg par 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi thad du/ blan med pa yang dag par
87a7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
87a8(khri brgyad): 'i nam ma pa gal bdag phyag mtshal lags ni med du ni/ ldad 'das gas te/ ga kyi chen pa'i 'dzin rten gyi ma na dag gags
87b1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper bgyi na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ mda' rgya'i tshal lam/ til gyi ning lta ba yongs su gtams par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
87b2(khri brgyad): bskal pa'ab/ bskal ba yas / ga pa chos bshad par gyur / de yin gshegs pa re ris kyang sems can ma ma mchis/ grang ches bdag yongs su smin par mdzadu kyang / co ldan 'das
87b3(khri brgyad): sems can gyi khams la ni 'grib pa ma 'phel bar mi mngon pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de
87b4(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste dper bgyid/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 
87b5(khri brgyad): tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cing bzhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas/ de
87b6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa re res kyangasapas can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis padag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la de 'grib pa'am 'phel bar me mngon pa
87b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du nan/ bcom ldan 'das sems can mamachis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de pan/ bdag gis 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
87b8(khri brgyad): chen pa gang dag sems ca dems kyi du// kun med pa lang danas pa gas pa'i byang chu mo 'jogs pa bcang rgyab de dag rnamamakha' yangs su rnal pa 'jam lags san
88a1(khri brgyad): de nas dge slong nig 'di snyam dus mas te 'di lta ste/ chos gang yang skye ba yang med/ 'ga' ba yang med la tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po dang / ting rje 'im
88a2(khri brgyad): kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'dra
88a3(khri brgyad): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dung
88a4(khri brgyad): yang yod// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
88a5(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin/ rab 'byor
88a6(khri brgyad): kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// 
88a7(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'cha
88a8(khri brgyad): klog pa dang / kun tub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du med la bgyed pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / srab rjel du zhig bgyi lags/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shig khyod kyis
88b1(khri brgyad): la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / srab bya ba'i chos da
88b2(khri brgyad): bos/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kai shi ga gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gan lan 'di nyid de la bkru
88b3(khri brgyad): dang / skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro// ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral na/ de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang grags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' se
88b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gang shig bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa yin no// kau shi ka 'di
88b5(khri brgyad): du sems khyod kyi smra ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dag bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar nus snyam 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor kyis
88b6(khri brgyad): kau shika de bzhin du ga shig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi ku
88b7(khri brgyad): dang / ngal ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur bar zad do// kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dag bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar nus smra
88b8(khri brgyad): bcu byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab byor kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
89a1(khri brgyad): dgal bsrung ba dang / drub ba da pag bya bar sems pa de yang 'di la mi grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar bad dok+ko shi ka 'dici snyam du sems khyod kyi chos kyi dbyings
89a2(khri brgyad): dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar nus snyam sa ma/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// ra
89a3(khri brgyad): byor kyi zhus pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du ga shig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen tshigasar ba kyim por tu phyid pa la spyod pa padag la bsrung ba dang rgyab po dang smra bar yoms pa de yang 'dis
89a4(khri brgyad): ba grub pa dang / dam pa'i skam pa can du 'gyur bar 'ad do// brgya byin gyis smras pa bdun par ba 'byod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji tsam
89a5(khri brgyad): dachos thams cad mi mam lta bu dang / sgyu mi lta bu dang / smig tshul bu dang brag Na lci bu dang mig yor lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing / de ltar yongs
89a6(khri brgyad): nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/ mi la ma dag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sil ma la rlom sems su mi byed/ mel
89a7(khri brgyad): mtshan mar yang rlob sems su ma byed cing / skal pa'i bar du rlom sems su ma byed/ sprul pa dog gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa 'i rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul ba'i mtshan mar
89a8(khri brgyad): yang rlob sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras po/ ko shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gas te/ gzugs dris sems su sa byed/ 
89b1(khri brgyad): gzugs bdag gis zhes bya bar rlob sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/ mi la pa du rlom sems su mi byed/ me la pa dag gis
89b2(khri brgyad): sa bya bar rlom sems byed/ mil ma lo rlom rnams kyim byeng/ sems kyis ldan pa yang sa mas pa byed nga/ sprum po ba rlol sems ma t+te/ sprus pa bdag gin
89b3(khri brgyad): rlom sems su le byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul ba'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
89b4(khri brgyad): mas sum byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi shes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rnam sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa mamatshan mar yang dum sems du mi byed la/ rnam pa thams
89b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad
89b6(khri brgyad): khyen pa nyid kyi mtshan ma yang rloms mas su mi byed na/ mi ma ma du rlom sems su ma byed / mi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi la mal rlom sems su mi myo / melam gyi mtshan pa
89b7(khri brgyad): du ma byed ce/  lapa ga zhenas bya ma kyirna yang
89b8(khri brgyad): kyi yi no// da kyim nu yong gsus kyi tshor ba la gas la 'i su gdus / sapas ldan dang / brdzu
90a1(khri brgyad): 8// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i
90a2(khri brgyad): nadad kyi phye ma dag thogs te/ ma ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon par 'phor shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lha gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
90a3(khri brgyad): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ 
90a4(khri brgyad): san sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir
90a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs suzhu ba dang / lha'i dbang pob tu byed / sdug gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'de nyid yongs su su dag bsams pad+ma gyur to// de bzhin
90a6(khri brgyad): rub dang / byung dang / 'og dang / skyeng / phyog choms kun na yang sangs rgyas stong stong rnam pa de dag nyid dang ming 'od dag nyid kyi chos ston cing/ sangs nas kyi mthus dag slong
90a7(khri brgyad): byin shrI sta ga zhes/ zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa 'di dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i dbang po'i tu phyin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
90a8(khri brgyad): po 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsam par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90b1(khri brgyad): chen po byam la bablan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyangs phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro// gang dag brgal
90b2(khri brgyad): 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs
90b3(khri brgyad): 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid sor par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsa / bcom ldan 'das ma tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
90b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya gnas/ rnam pa gang dag dang rtag gang dag dang mtshan ma gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol
90b5(khri brgyad): rten pa 'di nyon par 'gyur ba lags/ ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub thams dpa' sem le ma myo thad med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
90b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ me rtag ces bya bar chos spyod par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gzugs pa de zhes bya ba dang sdug bstsal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces
90b7(khri brgyad): ba dang / gzugs thug ces bya ba dang / oM skrag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings shes bya ba dang grol shes bya chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
90b8(khri brgyad): / da rnams dang rnam por shes pa rtag ceg bye ba dang mi rtag ces bya ba dang rnam par shes pa ba de zhes bya ba dang / srog bsngal zhes bya ba dod/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / 
91a1(khri brgyad): shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par thams zhes rgya ba dang / grom nas bya com ldan par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das pad
91a2(khri brgyad): 'ongs padag / dasur byung ba zhes bya ba rdzos ston pa mi 'gyur ro// de bzhi du tshor ba do 'du shes dang byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pad ma'ongs pa dang / dpe byung ba zhes bya ba chos ston
91a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings shes bya ba dang
91a4(khri brgyad): / grol zhes bya bar ches smon par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla ra
91a5(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzug sa shin tu nas sa
91a6(khri brgyad): / zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shel dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go nas shin tu rnam par dag cho na
91a7(khri brgyad): / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos snyan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
91a8(khri brgyad): la tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'a
91b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'dun rnams dang / rnam byar shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bAr
91b2(khri brgyad): budag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin te
91b3(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan la
91b4(khri brgyad): desbyar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs
91b5(khri brgyad): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / na
91b6(khri brgyad): shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyedan pa
91b7(khri brgyad): kye bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha'
91b8(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kye pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bam ldan 'das ji lta dam mkha' yangs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha
92a1(khri brgyad): 'ayongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ni skye ba mang pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun na sa nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnab pa
92a2(khri brgyad): 'amed pa'i phyir yongs su dag paste/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de sa
92a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phul ba/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ 
92a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags
92a5(khri brgyad): chos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' sla ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkar nangs sa
92a6(khri brgyad): bla ma mchis pa'i slad du/ she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta skye dper na/ brag cha gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 
92a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor dam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
92a8(khri brgyad): yino// rab 'byor nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta bananam mkha'
92b1(khri brgyad): jobs pa ches pa'i mdang/ shes rab kyisangs tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags ldan 'das rgyas ka 'phrul la// rab 'byor ma 'khangs norab tu dro pa gang yang medang/ 
92b2(khri brgyad): babed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rolal phyin pa yongs su dag pa yid no// rab 'byor nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i bye/ nas rab kyi yongs sbyin payongs su dag pa med no// sa kyis gsol ga
92b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni ci yang
92b4(khri brgyad): bu med do// rang 'byor de lta pa rnam mala' dmigs su med pa phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skyab med/ 
92b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / glan nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
92b6(khri brgyad): / mas dang / rnab par shes pa yi 'arnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / banan pa nyan mongs pa da pa dang / dam par byang ba meng pa'i phyir/ shes
92b7(khri brgyad): byin pa yong 'du dag pa yin no// rab 'byor nga bzhin du rnapa pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'a du shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye bamed pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / ku
92b8(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / ngag
93a1(khri brgyad): 5/ pas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha ro la phyin pa yongs su dam pa yin no// rab 'byor gyil gsol pa/ ma ldan 'das
93a2(khri brgyad): nachos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / skyobam pa ches po dang / dgag pa pa mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang bamam chis pa'i
93a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol su phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ raH rlo chos thams cad shin tun pa par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi yo phyin pa yongs su dag pa 'i
93a4(khri brgyad): rang 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / bran chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
93a5(khri brgyad): bgyid pa de la ni mig gis dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// na pa'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar 'i 'gyur lags so// yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// 68
93a6(khri brgyad): lags chang bar mi 'gyur lags so// lus ngal bar mi 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de ga shes gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so// de'i slad bzhin du chos nyan par 'tshal
93a7(khri brgyad): / bang po dag kyang 'thang bar 'gyur lags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i res kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ba'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lags so// gang na dam pa'i
93a8(khri brgyad): pa'i rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu ma ga chos brgyad dang / bcu bani dang / 
93b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khya
93b2(khri brgyad): gas du rjes padag skyed par 'gyur lags so// com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab kyir de bzhin no// de pa te/ rigs kyi bu 'am dgas kyi bu pog tshal bldan dang / bcu basbyi
93b3(khri brgyad): tsalnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar byed pa de ni bsod nams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa dag skyed par 'gyur ro// 
93b4(khri brgyad): nen/ rab 'byor 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'diran ring po che yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ston na sems can dbyam pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// 
93b5(khri brgyad): du 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur ro// gagin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar 'gyur ro// mi dbul ba las thang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams bu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bram
93b6(khri brgyad): riregs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gis rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// 
93b7(khri brgyad): sa med 'du shes med kyi bye mched du nye bor dgro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams pa skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i gas bu byud par byed pa'o// yon cig phyir 'ong ba'i
93b8(khri brgyad): bras bu dang / byer mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rub skyed par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zher 'di ltar shes rab kyi 'arol
94a1(khri brgyad): pa 'dis sa dge ba bcu'i las kyi la sa rnams rgya mer bstan te/ de la brten nas rgya ranas shing shA la chen pos/ tharnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sAl chen pos su
94a2(khri brgyad): bod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sAl chen po ltan rnams yong dang / mchen pashing rigs kyi lharnams dang / sum du gsus ba dang / 'bang bral dang / dag san dang / 'phrul dag
94a3(khri brgyad): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshang 'aris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'odags
94a4(khri brgyad): dag chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / miche ba dang / mig dung ba dang / 'og cen gyi
94a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med mid skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod bad/ 
94a6(khri brgyad): / rnan du zhugs pa'i 'bral bu yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
94a7(khri brgyad): yid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan can yod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa po ni dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du bye sa/ tshul khrim
94a8(khri brgyad): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
94b1(khri brgyad): na dang dang / skabs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / las rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid chod pa dang / dngos po med pathong na nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang / thabs bcu yod pa
94b2(khri brgyad): pa 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha ro
94b3(khri brgyad): ba 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
94b4(khri brgyad): 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhen 'di ltar gang dag skyab ba 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon
94b5(khri brgyad): mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni/ dge ba 'am/ me dge bam/ 
94b6(khri brgyad): zag pa dang 'aca' ba'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ khan pa po ba'am/ kha nam lo ba drang bcas pa 'am/ ldan ma co'i med pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'dri/ 
94b7(khri brgyad): rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyis chos gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nor
94b8(khri brgyad): rab 'asbyor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che yin te rin po med 'ini chos kyang gis kyang mgos pa yin ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su med pa'i phyi
95a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor des na pha rol tu phyid pa na po che 'di ni gos pa med pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa la spyod bgal te/ sres
95a2(khri brgyad): 'du shes par yang mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog pa yang mi byed de ltar dmigs par yang mi byed/ de ltar spros par yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
95a3(khri brgyad): lasgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas
95a4(khri brgyad): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangab rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// 
95a5(khri brgyad): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ stor par byed pa ma yir/ 'dzin par byed pa ma yin/ skyid par byed pa ma yin/ skyed par byed pa ma yin/ 'gog pa gyi
95a6(khri brgyad): pa pa yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ bgrib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ya yin/ 'das pa pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar
95a7(khri brgyad): ba yang ma yin no// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams dang / 
95a8(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa 'is bas las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas bar byed pa yang ma yin/ skyed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyed par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ba ye
95b1(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / bcan 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'drang bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dang byung ba nyid sbyin par byed pa ya
95b2(khri brgyad): 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa yang ma yod/ 'dor par byed pa yang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 
95b3(khri brgyad): bar byed par mi yin/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa
95b4(khri brgyad): yin/ stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad sbyin par byed
95b5(khri brgyad): pa yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par smad pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
95b6(khri brgyad): com pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yino// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas te chos rnas
95b7(khri brgyad): na bar byed pa yang ma yid/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ so sor skye bo'i chos rnams skyen par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
95b8(khri brgyad): byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yid/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sten par byed pa yang ma ber/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma mi ro// rab 'byar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdus bya
96a1(khri brgyad): khams 'dong bar byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dus pa byes kyi khabs skyed par byed pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyung yang rung / de bzhin
96a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnabs sa kyang yang rung / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni gnas pa nyid do// de de 'azhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis mngon par thugs su rud de/ mngon pa
96a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang / gsung ba dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'apyad pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tus
96a4(khri brgyad): dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ ca co dang / gzhi 'dor cing / lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dar bdag gis gtong
96a5(khri brgyad): kring du rgyas khyi gakhor lo la gnyis bskyer ba 'di pa 'ang ngo // zhes tshig du yang 'arjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan / dA las pa'i bu stong thug du ma dag zhes mi skye bya'i
96a6(khri brgyad): bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cong ldan parab 'byor la 'dind ces bka' stsal to// dpa med ci'i ngos nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shwar ba kyi
96a7(khri brgyad): 'di chos gang yang ju khar bya ba ma/ ldog par bya ba'i skyer zhi ba gnas pa ma yin pas// rab thor 'din chos kyi la go lo bskor ba gnyis pa ldangs yis/ gshegs yang pa yi na/ 
96a8(khri brgyad): byod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga na tso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'din chos gang par 'dun par bkyi gas/ sdug par bkyi 'a'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags
96b1(khri brgyad): dngas po ma mchis pa'i rom nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcod ldan 'das rjem bka' stsal pa// raba' tshu zhes ma kyi la rol tu phyin pani/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas myong // dubad du
96b2(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang / brtson 'phrul dang / bzod pa dang / tshul sdebs dang / sbyid pa'i 'a rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // rang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dong ngo // dngos po
96b3(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // drad pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdu 'bru
96b4(khri brgyad): kyirkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni lam gyis stong // stobs bcu ni stobs bcus stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par reg pa bzhed
96b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco kyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus spong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
96b6(khri brgyad): 'gas bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra 'acom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor kyis gsol
96b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'des ste/ dngo kho ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa 'di ni che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chob thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong sa kyang chub
96b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brte das/ shAn med pa
97a1(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor po yang bskor bcos gang yang 'jug par brjid pa ngam/ ldog par bgyid pa ma mchis te/ cho snga gapa bang yongs su mtho
97a2(khri brgyad): ba lang ma mchis pa/ chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba yang ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gang yang 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i
97a3(khri brgyad): srad du ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa lags pas stong ba nyid ni 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa
97a4(khri brgyad): pang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid par lags so// de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug ba dang / 
97a5(khri brgyad): ma par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smol pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags so// shes
97a6(khri brgyad): rarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang lus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung lags so// gang sus kyang ba bstan sus kyang ma ba zung ba de ni sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyid lags so// gang sus kyang
97a7(khri brgyad): ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung / sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa nga la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su bar ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la su yang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yang ma mchis
97a8(khri brgyad): gas so// shes rab kyis sa phyid mthi brgyad stong pa las gan sa med pa ma zhes bya/ yum dus bdun pa'o// 
97b1(khri brgyad): da sa sa cocom ldan 'das 'des ste/ shes rabakye pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i
97b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigs
97b3(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa la yas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ @#
97b4(khri brgyad): sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzib ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
97b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ chos tham cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ni gzhi ma mchis pa lags so// 
97b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam
97b7(khri brgyad): mkha' lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbug phyed dadu rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
97b8(khri brgyad): sa khyer pa 'arol phyin pa 'din badzad dum mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'dis kyis bka' bral ba/ rnam par rtog pa dang / ram par dpyod ba dmigs su med pa phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis// 
98a1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
98a2(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
98a3(khri brgyad): pa'adi ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes pa
98a4(khri brgyad): phyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang sprul pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyil gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis
98a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rol tu phyin pa 'din pas pa lags so// bcom ldan pa dpa kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad shin du bya ba deng zad pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol la @
98a6(khri brgyad): 'da' 'dis ste/ shes ras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'din skye ba ma ches pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi skye bamed pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
98a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'din byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
98b1(khri brgyad): bka' thub pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyi la gso pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shas rab kyi pha ro tu phyin pa na nas pa sngags so/ 
98b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i
98b3(khri brgyad): 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'ad sa ste/ 
98b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol su phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi la ma la bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral ba/ mi khamachis pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
98b5(khri brgyad): 'das 'de ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa rol tu sbyin bu 'di ni thag 'a bre lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra'i 'ang pa dmigs su mad pa'i byer ro// rab 'byor gyi
98b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi gagal ste/ bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gzugs brnyan dmigs su
98b7(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ga rgyalta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab
98b8(khri brgyad): sku med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ she kyi sa khyen dos pyod pa dini rnasal bu laga'a'o// btsab ldar 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma
99a1(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
99a2(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa pa rol tu phyid pa 'din kun nas
99a3(khri brgyad): phongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
99a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par bya ba ma mchis pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
99a5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas pa mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs
99a6(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byer gyis gas papa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/  so ba kyi ma rol du sbyin pa ngos tu sbyir pa 'di ni dmigs sum mdzes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'a
99a7(khri brgyad): byal ba/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma pa ches pa lags so// 
99a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal g.yom sa dpa dag par sams ga sa kyi sben pol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa pha rol tu phyid pa 'di ni rlom sems sa
99b1(khri brgyad): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlob sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
99b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyis dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
99b3(khri brgyad): rab rje pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed
99b4(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
99b5(khri brgyad): ba/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byer kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de zhi ba lags so// bco
99b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
99b7(khri brgyad): phyir pa 'di de 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldanapa
99b8(khri brgyad): ras phyin pa pa sa su mye pa mas sa sa lam gan na pa byes 'ag
100a1(khri brgyad): rab tu phyin pa khri brgyad spang // ma po sum cug gas ldan 'das 'di sa
100a2(khri brgyad): phyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti shugs 'ches pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug gi kun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom lnga
100a3(khri brgyad): / 'de b+ha ste/ shesas kyipha rol tu byed pa pha rol phyin pazhin nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
100a4(khri brgyad): na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi
100a5(khri brgyad): 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos pas
100a6(khri brgyad): nanas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan
100a7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres
100a8(khri brgyad): sa so// bcob ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsal ga/ bam ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shel rab kyis mo phyin pa pha rol tu
100b1(khri brgyad): mas ches pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag pa par das pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la
100b2(khri brgyad): shes par kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ rnam par rtog par dmi gas su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
100b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi
100b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam mkha' stsa bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
100b5(khri brgyad): 'khang ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
100b6(khri brgyad): sbal la chos thams cad 'a gro pa med pa byor ro// rag myod kyis gsol la/ bcom ldan 'as 'di sa ste/ ga' kyi rol tu phyin pa 'arol phyin pa 'di zag bsngal ba lags so// bcom
100b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'as steste/ shes rab ce yo phyin pa pa rol du phyin pa 'di ni da
100b8(khri brgyad): ma ches pa lags so// ngom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mdzan par men bzod pa phyir ro// rab gar kyis gsol pa/  ldanas ste/ shes rab kyi co ba rol kyi
101a1(khri brgyad): stongs nyid lags so// bcos ldan 'das kyig ka' byas pa/ rol lams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su zen phyir ga/ narab byod gyis dacom pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis na/ 
101a2(khri brgyad): pa kyipha rol tu phyin kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa 'don mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pamasacadam tshan mi med pa'i phyir ro//  byas
101a3(khri brgyad): u 'di / shes la tu phyin pa pa rol tu phyin pa 'a nang stong pa nyid lags so// chom ldan 'das / dmags su // 
101a4(khri brgyad): sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// 
101a5(khri brgyad): pa 'byod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa pha rol tu phyin padzad de phyid stong pa nyid lagapa 'o// ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyin nganang gi
101a6(khri brgyad): rlags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa 'du ldan pa di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das
101a7(khri brgyad): la pa/ thob nyid stong nyid ga' ba pa'i phyir ma/  ldan 'a /  ro du phyi mas phyin pa 'di ni chen pa stong bzhin
101a8(khri brgyad): bachos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkyen pa stong pa nyid dmigs su 'a pa'i phyir ro// rab byor gyis gsol pa/  pa ldan 'das 'dis ste/ sar bgyi pha rol du phyin pa pa ma tu phyin
101b1(khri brgyad): dmapa stong pa'i lags po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs du med kyi phyir zhen can por gyis gsongag com ldan 'das 'di /  khyi rol rgyan
101b2(khri brgyad): su phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs bu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
101b3(khri brgyad): byin pa rol tu phyin pa 'don 'dungs kya thong pa nyid canapa so// bcom ldan 'das kyis pags sas pa 'dusas bya pa nyid dmig mi du med pa'i byed ro// rab byed gyis gsal pa/ 
101b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lagapa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' la pa 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i
101b5(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang thas med pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
101b6(khri brgyad): thog pa dang med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa 'bar// rab 'byor gyis gsoso pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis pa/ shes kyi rol du phyin pa rlos su sbyin pa 'din dong ba med pa sgos
101b7(khri brgyad): nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyil gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
101b8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus sa byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyiraro// 
102a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgang
102a2(khri brgyad): sprul pa/ chos thags cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong banyin
102a3(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
102a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyid pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa spong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
