164a4(khri brgyad): po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag leg
164a5(khri brgyad): legs so// lha'i bungadag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dang pas/ sa su brang ba dang / chos kyis rjes su 'brang / brgya byu / rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / par ma
164a6(khri brgyad): bcos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin no// lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu
164a7(khri brgyad): gas kyi mog sa las gas rab kyi pha rol// phyin pa bab mo da pos pa/ shes nas kyang mi ga 'a ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang // ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du mi byed pa'i
164a8(khri brgyad): sa kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes par bya'i/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral ba
164b1(khri brgyad): mdo 'i gzhan dag la spyod pa de dag ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs
164b2(khri brgyad): da ma da kyi ni pang ba rnam pa dang / phyir mi 'di 'dum pa dang / dbu ba tsam pa rnams dang / rang sas rgyas kyi leg pa la ya dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
164b3(khri brgyad): dbab chen po rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gang la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
164b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba/ mngon par rdzogs par sa sa r+m+mas / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab dang/ myangon par rdzogs papa phying rgya bar 'gyur gyi yang dgasas gyi tshus rnams shes pa
164b5(khri brgyad): kyi pa ga rten pa pa'im ba las rgya mer bstan pa'i phyir ro// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na stong pa'i lha'i bu dag gi bcom ldan 'das ste 'di skang ces gsol to// 
164b6(khri brgyad): hrIH9/ gis sa kyi la rol phyin pa rol phyin po tsha lags so// maldan das da// soras kyi sa rol tu myed pa rol tu phyin pa'adi ni ma tshungs thams kyis bden

170b5(khri brgyad): sems da 'a chen ba den par mdod blan med pa yang dag par rdzog pa byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur ro// depa'i phyir nan/ pa bying byang chub sems de pa'i gang blan mame de rje yang dag pa 'dza
170b6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyir/ da pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ dang pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ 'dod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ btong ba lang yod/ brtson ying gtong ba yang yod la/ 
170b7(khri brgyad): dges sa kyi po la tu phyi pas kyang yongs su zin cipa mabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su can te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis kyang yongs su zin 'i hrI te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
170b8(khri brgyad): chen po da'i nyan thob kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyisar srung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor di lta ste dpar na/ mi skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/ nas shing g.yogs la gtug bzhig yad/ de'i lus la rlung las grub
171a1(khri brgyad): 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/ bdakan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur ba'i nang 'ga' zhig byung na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ bi mi de rang dgar ldang pa'i mthu dang ldan nam/ 
171a2(khri brgyad): ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor tsam ldang bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi de ni khrilas ldang ba'i ji thog tu lags
171a3(khri brgyad): kyang de ni nas pa de dang / brond de dag gi nyams dmas pas/ dpang tshad gcig gis par 'am/ dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du 'chi ba'i mthu yang ma mchis te/ khrid las ldang ba'i rngordo thog tu lags kyang mchis
171a4(khri brgyad): me thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ 
171a5(khri brgyad): yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ deng ba yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ 'dod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ gtong ba yang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod du yin kyang / de shes rab kyis
171a6(khri brgyad): da phyin pas yongs su mayin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin la/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
171a7(khri brgyad): yongs su ma yin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir/ bar mdor lam du nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mi skyes
171a8(khri brgyad): lo te bu lon pa nas shing chogs sa/ gtsug par gyur pa del rgya las sur sa/ mabris pa las gyur pa'am// bdagan las gyur pa'i ga / 'dus palas gyur ba'i da kyis nyams das so / 
171b1(khri brgyad): mi bas dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mtshan g.yas g.yon nas brten te/ bteg nas khri las bslang ta/ 'di skad du bya'i rgyong 'bacag gnyis kyis bdun te bzung gis gang du 'dod pa dang / gang dga' nga
171b2(khri brgyad): song shig dang gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du bar ma dor 'gyel bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes zer ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
171b3(khri brgyad): phyir/ dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yang / dka' ba yang yod/ dang ba yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ 'did pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ gtong ba yang yod/ martson pa mi gtong ba yang yod/ de gas
171b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su phyin cing / thabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su zin na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar mdor ldog par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/ byang chu
171b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gran sad 'thob pa'i mthu dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
171b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo pang chub sems dpa' thag pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ ji ltar zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing thabs la mkhas pas yongs sum zin la/ nyan
171b7(khri brgyad): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ltung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di
171b8(khri brgyad): bar sems pa lags sa legs so// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma lon ri sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa ni dang 'dzin pa dang / ngang yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis sbyin pa sbyinapa
172a1(khri brgyad): byed cing / tshul khrims gang bsrung ba dang bzod pa gang bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab gang sgom pa de yang ngar 'dzin
172a2(khri brgyad): ba dang / nga yir 'dzin par ldang ba'i sems kyis shes rab skom par byed do// de sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no sbyin pa 'di smin par bya'o/ bdag ni sbyin pa dang ldan no// 
172a3(khri brgyad): bdag gis tshul khrims bsgreng ngo // bdag gis tshul khrims bsgom par bya'o// bdagon tshul khrims dang ldan no// bdag gis bzod par bya'o// bdag gis ba bod pa bsgom par bya'o// khang gan
172a4(khri brgyad): babad pa dang ldan no// bdag gis brtson 'grus ba rloms so// bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam byar b+ha'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan no// bdag bsam gtan ba snyoms par
172a5(khri brgyad): bdag gis bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o// bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan no// bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo// bdag gis shes rab ba sgom par byeg/ kha dag ji shes rab dang ldan no snyas ste/ de
172a6(khri brgyad): rlo sems su byed do// smin pa de rlob sems su byed do// bdag gi sbyin pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dag shes rab rlom
172a7(khri brgyad): sems su byed do// shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed do// bdag gi shes rab snyam du rlos sems su byed do// de ci'i bu ba zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med de sbyin pa'i pha
172a8(khri brgyad): / rol tu phyin pa ni mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de dag med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
172b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nim mthar byin pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa meg pa pa nges nim
172b2(khri brgyad): mtha' yang mi shes pa rol yang mi shes pa'i phyir te/ de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs sum yin cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson bgrus kyi pha rol tu phyin
172b3(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su mthon pas/ nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas
172b4(khri brgyad): sar ltung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji ltar thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab
172b5(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byeng chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pas thog mkho nar smin basbyin par byed cing thabs la mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims srung bar byed thapas
172b6(khri brgyad): la mim khas pas bzod pa sgom par byed pa pas mi mkhas pas// brtson pagrus rlom par byed thabs la mi mkhas pas/ bas ma gtan la snyoms par badrug par byed thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shis rapo snyom par
172b7(khri brgyad): byed cing de 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no 'di la sbyin par bya'i smin pa 'di spen par bya'o bdag gis tshul khrims srung ngo // bdag gis bzod pa sbom mo bdag gis brtson 'grus ba
172b8(khri brgyad): / bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o// bdag gis shes rab bsgom par bya'o// shes rab da bo sgom par bya'i snyam ste/ de srin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed da/ 
173a1(khri brgyad): ni smin pa'o/ snyam du rlom sems su byed do// de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed do// tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrimapa dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su
173a2(khri brgyad): ngo// bzod pa rlom sems su byed pazed pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni babod pa dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do// brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su
173a3(khri brgyad): dag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byeng // bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o snyam du
173a4(khri brgyad): sems byed do// gis rab rlos sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlob semasu byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do// deci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i lhur rnam par rtog pa bzhin
173a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mthar phyin pa yin la/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
173a6(khri brgyad): depa yin pa'i phyir ro// da myur rnam par rtog pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par drug pa de dag med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni lam sbyin pa yin no
173a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni pa mthar yang me shes pha rol yang migs pa'i phyir ro// de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
173a8(khri brgyad): ma nag rnas pamamasas ma khyen pa da gyims kyi sa yongs su pa mi pa gtasas kyis dmas sa rgyas kyis zung bar 'gyu pa nas pabs par ma khyen pa nyid bum pa ga bya
173b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na sna chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / thabs lam khas pas yongs sum zin pas/ nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mar ltung bar 'gyur ro// rab bya
173b2(khri brgyad): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de myang shesar gyi pa phyin pa dang / thabs las kham pas yongs su byin ma nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mi lta shing / blan med de yang dag par

173b4(khri brgyad): ba du zlos par byed de/ de di mam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyidan sbyin pa'adi sbyin par bya'o// 'di ma skyon pa sbyin par bya'o// sku ra rnamasems su mi byed do// zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang
173b5(khri brgyad): sh+tsa te/ de sbyin pa la rlom snyoms su mi byed sbyin pas rnam mam po su mi byed/ bdag kyi sbyin pa'os ma rlom mams pa myi byed do// de bzhin du sbyar ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems sa
173b6(khri brgyad): giso gyi kyi senas sa mi byed bdag gi tshogasar ba ba sgyus du rnaMm mim smras byed de// de'i du/ 'a r+b+hu y-i rab tu kyi po ldan gang gis ma semams byed pa'i ma mo klub sno
173b7(khri brgyad): sheshes rab kyi sa ro tu phyin pa'i bar du gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ma mthar phyin pa kyis
173b8(khri brgyad): rab mas da 'ad bang mam tha yang shes pa mas shes te/ ma sems mi byed pa ni sbyi pa gyi pas yongs su can pa yin no// tshul khrims kyi pa sa phyin pa dang / bzod 'i
174a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zer cig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kye bar gyi yong su zin
174a2(khri brgyad): k+ShesA dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rang 'byor da ltar nA chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
174a3(khri brgyad): nini de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pas yongs min te/ nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// nag po'i phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du dkar po'i phyogs thams cad la yong de bzhi
174a4(khri brgyad): bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gru'i le'agres byaste pazhi bcu rtsa lnga po'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan pa

174a8(khri brgyad): sa tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha ram tu phyin pa la slob pa pa dod pas/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di san pa gang yin pa'i dge

174b2(khri brgyad): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston te/ rigs kyi bu tshur zhog/ khyed kyis smin pa gang dang gang smin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngol shig/ rigs kyi bu chur shog

174b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams las rtog par ma byed cig/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sosal pa
174b8(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las tog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang rtog par ma byed ci ga rnam pa thams cadas
175a1(khri brgyad): / shA kyi ba la lang rtog par ma byed ceg/ na khyer zhem gzugs ma na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur zhig / tshor ba dang / 'dushe sa dang / 'bye nas
175a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
175a3(khri brgyad): rkyen pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rtog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi rnyog/ nang stong pa nyid dang pongos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la me to// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
175a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lal mi rtog mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang me 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
175a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas ni chos ma 'dres pa 'i co brgyad la mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu khyod zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la 'dod pam
175a6(khri brgyad): kA/  ci'i phyi byen/ kAzugs 'dod med pa yin pa'i phyi 'o// dgas kyi khyod rgya rab dang du shes dpa' byed dpas dang / rnam par shes pa'i ba la 'dod pam skyed cig/ rtson gyi gram rigs kyi bu rnam pa sa
175a7(khri brgyad): 'dod med po phyi mo/ gas kyi khyod sbyin pa'i pha rom du ldan pal 'dod pam skye cig/ tshul khri mas dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sam gtan gyi
175a8(khri brgyad): kyi rol tu phyin pal 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ nad stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnabs la 'dod pa ma skyed ci// yangangs pa
175b1(khri brgyad): dang / nAb+hagal gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / skyobs dang / byang chub kyi phan mag dpa/ lam rnams kyi pa ma 'ded pas skyed cig/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / stob sa bcu dpa / ma 'jigs pa dang / so mo yang dag par rig pa dang
175b2(khri brgyad): gyi bar 'dres pa rnams la 'dod pa ma spyod cig/ rigs kyi ba khyod nam thathams cad 'khyen pa nyi sa yang 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de'i phyi nem rigs kyi bu rnam pa thams cad pa khyen pa nyid ni 'dod pa med cing
175b3(khri brgyad): byu ba len pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu khyod rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma snyed cig/ lani cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la 'dod pa ma

175b7(khri brgyad): // da ni I byung chub sems pa sem chen po gang nga chos pams cang dang gi satsun nyi kyi spyong papa/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung dub don du / sa
175b8(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos
176a1(khri brgyad): / sum lta bu dang / tshi las su bla shesan/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chungab la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// byang chub sem sa dang 'a phems dpa' rten po rnams ni 'jig rten ma phan pa
176a2(khri brgyad): dang / bde'i'i ra yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/ bdag 'jig rten gyi skyob par gyur cig/ ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi skabs su drung
176a3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi gnas dang / 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen dang / 'jig rten gyi gling dang / 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rten du gyuran ci ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ya
176a4(khri brgyad): dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
176a5(khri brgyad): pa chen po rnams kyi sems can rnams 'gro ba lnga las yongs su kol bar byas nas/ mya ngan lam 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa bde ba'i tha la 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa
176a6(khri brgyad): ses dang 'a chen po blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub
176a7(khri brgyad): da' sems pa chen pa rnas sa ltar 'jig rten la 'di'i phyi pang dag pa dkrugs pa yin nen/ rab 'byor di byung rgya mos pa'i sems dpa' chen po rgyu med pa yang dag pa
176a8(khri brgyad): ngogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad las grol bar byas nas/ 
176b1(khri brgyad): las 'das pa 'jig pa med pa bde pa'i bang la 'god ba byed de/ ra 'byor de lta na byang chub sem pa dpa' sems dpa chen ma pa 'jig rten da m+b+hi nga dag ba na gas payin / 
176b2(khri brgyad): mas dpa 'a sems dpa 'chen pa blan pa ba ya dadas pa gas pa'i byer chu smin par rdzogs par ched rgyab da nam sangs 'di kun gyi sgom po yo byer ribar byor 'di la byang chub sri mor
176b3(khri brgyad): ses dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag las sems can rnams
176b4(khri brgyad): cid/ de dag spong ba phyir chos ston to// de dag gis chos de thos nas/ ram gyis theg pa gsum po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'dar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
176b5(khri brgyad): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan med pa
176b6(khri brgyad): pa rtogs pa'i stan 'jigs par 'dod rnams nga dag / ra sa su rlo ba'i mi ma dpa' sems pa rdzun na
176b7(khri brgyad): / ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang sa par 'dod pa nam kyis seM skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'dzin pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
176b8(khri brgyad): chos can rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang na pa dpa 'chi ba dang / myang na dang smre sngags 'dren pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi de bdang / 'jug pa rnams las yong su grol bar byed la/ yongasu bkrol nas/ sung sa
177a1(khri brgyad): / ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin no// rab 'byor byang chub
177a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gnas yin zhen/ rab 'byor 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad 'dra ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te// rab 'byor
177a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsil pa/ bcom ldan
177a4(khri brgyad): sku tshas thams cad de ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin te/ de ni gzugs kyi skye ba med pa yin no// 
177a5(khri brgyad): ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa yin te/ de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin no// tshe rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
177a6(khri brgyad): yinu pa de nirnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa yin te/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang sbyar bar bya'o// rab 'byor de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan med pa yang dag pa
177a7(khri brgyad): ribyang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar rgya bar 'dod pa rnams chos thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
177a8(khri brgyad): 'dod par rdzogs par 'ching bya mar 'dod pa nam pa ji ltar 'jig rten bye dpung gnyen len zhes rab 'byor 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pornams sems ca rnams la 'di skad du chos ston te/ gas
177b1(khri brgyad): bol gang yin pa de ni gzug pa ma yin na// tshor ba dang 'dugs dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
177b2(khri brgyad): pha rol gang yin pa de ni dam pa thams cad la byen pa nyid ma yin no// des chos ston te/ rab 'gror gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rang myor kyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gas
177b3(khri brgyad): dag zugs de lta ba bzhi lags na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam pa thams cad 'khyen pa nyid bdon par rdzogs par bangs rgyas pa nyid du mi 'gyur lags pa / de ci'i slad du da/ com ldan sa
177b4(khri brgyad): gzugs pa rol na rnam par rtog pa ce sa mas chis la/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i yo rnam par rtog pa ci ya ma mchis te/ de bzhin du 'di ni gzugs so// dri ni tshor ba 'o
177b5(khri brgyad): so// 'di ni 'du byed rnams so// 'dir rnam par shes pa 'obs brtse ba dang/ sbyin nam pa rnams cad ma skyed pa nyid de zhes bya ba'i bar du rnas pa thams cad khyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol ma rnam par rtog bcig ma
177b6(khri brgyad): smad du s+ho// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ring bzhin no// deng ba'i mer 'byor gzugs kyi ba lan rnas par rjod pa sel med la// rnam pa rtsam pa dang khyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rol marnamapa
177b7(khri brgyad): dag pa ci yang med de rab 'byor 'od kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos de lta bu dgas nges par sems nyi zhus par yang mi 'gyur la de ltar mol de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byas
177b8(khri brgyad): de ltar blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos de dag ni 'di ltar zhi ba'o// 'di ltar gya nom pa'o zhes ston par byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor
178a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems da sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig cen kyi dpung gnyen yin no// rab 'byor byang chub
178a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas ma blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongon par rdzogs par sangs kyas na// de ltar bang/ rten tu gling du dgyur zhen/ rab 'byor 'di na skyeng por sa du chen
178a3(khri brgyad): choms sam rgya mtsho chen po dag na/ sa phyogs gang dag rgyas yongs su chod pa de dag ni gleng zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang li mi'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rab 'bor tshor ba dang 'du shes drangal
178a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang rgyu ma'i mtha' yongs su chud pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthang yongs su chad pa'o// rab byor sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
178a5(khri brgyad): ngas su chad pa de dag gis chos thams cad yongs su cad do// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi sngon mi mtha'adang phyi ma'i mam yongs su chud pa gang ri na pa de ni di la ste stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'am cangad pa dang / 
178a6(khri brgyad): pa pa dag / lhags med pa dang / 'dod cags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang myang nams 'das pa yin ste/ de 'i ning po can papa'o// de ni de lce ba'i bad / nyid yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
178a7(khri brgyad): nathonams kyis blan med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ sa thams cad sngon gyi mapa da pyi ma pa yongs su rlo pa ni jig rtes kyi krI yi mo// ra
178a8(khri brgyad): dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ponapa pa blan med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba mngon par rdzogs par mangs kyis nas/ de ltar 'dzig rten gyi yongs su dren par gyur na na/ rab byor dir byang chub sems
178b1(khri brgyad): raba' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams sems cadan kyi res la snying rje chen po bskyed nas/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
178b2(khri brgyad): ku nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med par chos ston ci 'chad do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
178b3(khri brgyad): rnam par bya ba med pachos ldan / zhin tu kyi ma pa la yas sa ci bas ci kyi chung kyi phyisas kyi mnapas dang / skabs btsud ge pa jigs pa pa dpe pa
178b4(khri brgyad): rams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cir 'chad // nga s+ya
178b5(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kunan pa nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med par chos skyon cing 'acad do// rgyun dugags pa'i 'bras bu sle ba med pa dang / 'ag po med pa dang / kun nas nyin mongs pa med pa / 
178b6(khri brgyad): dam par byang ba med pa chos ston cing 'chad ro// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra ba tsam pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gug pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa pa/ rnas
178b7(khri brgyad): blang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnam
178b8(khri brgyad): yos su rjen pa pa gyu // ra byang byang chub sam pa dpa' mas da' chen pon pa/ rgan ba la da par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngod par rdzogs par sa sa rgyas dpa/ de ltar sems can dmas kyi nas kyu
179a1(khri brgyad): nen/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs ni nam mkha'i tshul can no// 
179a2(khri brgyad): chos skyon cing 'tshad do// tshor ba dang / la shes dang / 'dabyed rapas dang / rnam par shes pa ni na pas 'i tshul can non pa sems can rnams la chos sgron cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar nam ma'i'i tshul can
179a3(khri brgyad): sa chos ston to// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med do// zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'grob
179a4(khri brgyad): 'o'ong ba med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la slob dang 'ong ba med do// zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid
179a5(khri brgyad): gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med de zhes sems can rnamapa la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
179a6(khri brgyad): sogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang tshe thams cid ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul na te/ de dag tshul de las mi 'ad pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhes/ stong pa nyid la 'gro
179a7(khri brgyad): bsi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni dul can de las mi 'ad 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong bami dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
179a8(khri brgyad): ya ba spo pa 'di tshul ba da du ladeb mi mgo 'i phyi gis smod pamed pa la 'grob mthong ba mid rigs pa'i byed mi/ ras byor byos thams cad ni do par byed pa ma la me pa
179b1(khri brgyad): rilasa'i 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhem mngon par 'a byed pa med pal 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sur te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa mang ba dang kun nas nyan mongs pa med pa da / 
179b2(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang 'bag pa med pa deng kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba'ama'ang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyi'o// 
179b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul can
179b4(khri brgyad): dang / mig yor lta/ bu'i tshul can dang / sprul pa lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir de ma/ sprul pa la 'gro ba ma 'ong ba mi dmigs po'i phyir ro// rang 'byor chos thams cada'i skye ba med pa ded dngos po me
179b5(khri brgyad): tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'dra'o// 'i phyir zhen/ skye ba med pa drang dngos po med pa la 'ong ba'am// 'gro 'i ma dam bsdu pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha' yas mu med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las
179b6(khri brgyad): ye 'o// de ci'i kyi she/ mtha' mas su med pal 'gro ba 'am ba ba med migs pa'i byed// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'bri ba med pa dang bstan pa med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'o// dkyi'i phyir zhes kyi
179b7(khri brgyad): bamed pa dang bsnan pa med bra la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i tshul can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul canan
179b8(khri brgyad): ya tsham thams cad ni brang ba med pa dang bral ba med pa dang dre med pa dang mi 'dri ba med pa'i tshul can go/ rab 'byor chos thams cad bdag kyi tshul can to dgan nul de las mi 'do na/ daci kyi shes kyi
180a1(khri brgyad): / 'byor bdag la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir mo// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can gyi tshul rngan no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni srog dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag/ 
180a2(khri brgyad): shedasas skyes pa dang ba 'dang byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang sring ba por shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i tshul can te/ de dag gi tshul de las myi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab byor bdag gtan medo cing sems can do
180a3(khri brgyad): srog dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag shed las skyes dang sheng bu dang byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang slong ba po dang shes pa po dang / mthong ba po yang gtan med na/ rab 'byor 'gro ba'am 'ong ba ltar dmigs par
180a4(khri brgyad): ka la 'gyur rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa ci yang gtan med na/ 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lhag la yod rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba'i
180a5(khri brgyad): tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can dang / sdug pa'i tshul can te dge me tshul de las mi 'da'o// de tso'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa dang bde ba dang / bdag dang / srub pag
180a6(khri brgyad): med na de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i tshul can yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/ de dgan tshul de
180a7(khri brgyad): las mi 'do'o// de ci'i phyir she na/ rab 'bor mi rtag pa gtan med cing sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag med pa'am/ mi sdug pa gtan med na de'i 'dra ba bas 'ong ba lhag la yod/ rab 'byor rjes thams cad ni 'dod cha
180a8(khri brgyad): can te/ de dag na tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi dngos po gtan med na 'did chags lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul re
180b1(khri brgyad): me da'o// cad bye shes rang 'byor zhe nga ni ngo po gtan ma na/ zhesang rtag la da/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi tshul na te/ da dag ni rdul de las mi 'da'o// de'i phyi shes/ rab 'byor/ 
180b2(khri brgyad): gti mug gi dngos po gtan med na gti mug lhag la yod// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta bar gyur pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las me 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lta bar gyur pa'i dngos po gtan med na lta bar
180b3(khri brgyad): gyur pa lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'ang 'o// de ci'i phyir zher/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams
180b4(khri brgyad): rochos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshul can dang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir
180b5(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byer bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni me g.yo ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byo
180b6(khri brgyad): 'aka' la yang gso pa med pas 'gro ba'am 'ad ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can te/ de da/ ni tshul de las mi 'da'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang 'byor gzugs gtan med na/ 
180b7(khri brgyad): de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba ldag la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las ci 'da'o// 
180b8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa gtan mi dmigs na/ de'i 'gro ba'am 'ang bltad dmigs par gal 'gyur/ rab 'byor ches thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tsal de las mi
181a1(khri brgyad): nan/ rab 'byor smin pa gtan medun/ sprin phyin pa lhag pa yong/ rab shin du che thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha ros tu phyin pa'i tshul can no// rang 'gror chos thams cad ni dmang ba
181a2(khri brgyad): yon grus dang pasam gtan dang / she sarab kyi pa la sbyin pa'i tshul nas/ de dag ni tshul de las mi na/  gyi / rab byor me par gyi ma tsho myi pagatan mdam de slo ma 'ong ba ltag pa yong
181a3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul can yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul can nyid dag na tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir she na/ dngol po med
181a4(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid gtan med ni mi'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lhag 'ayod/ ra 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshum de las myi 'du'o// de ci'i phyir shes/ dran pa nye bar bgags
181a5(khri brgyad): rnams gtan med na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba ltag la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad de/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 
181a6(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bani dang / so so yang dag par reg pa pazhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa co rkyed kyi tshul chen te/ dro dag ni tshul de la ba gyi 'dra'o// de tso'i phyi zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
181a7(khri brgyad): la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ ngab 'byor chos thams cad ni spun tu zhugs pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las me 'da'a'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad na lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong bang
181a8(khri brgyad): dgra com pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ram 'byor rang yangs rgyas rnams la 'gro ba la ma'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad
181b1(khri brgyad): nad dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tshutshul can/ de dgan tshul degs mi 'dang // N+Da nyung zhes ra 'byor blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dalegs pa'i phyir ro// 
181b2(khri brgyad): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha roladu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bu dag mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag rtsa
181b3(khri brgyad): named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi kyi spyod spyod pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal bdag la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su smin par byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sangs
181b4(khri brgyad): mang po phye ga/ khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes garan gyis yongs su zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bde la mos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khreb rgyad
181b5(khri brgyad): l+ya/ chos pam da bying banyid bstan pa'i se she / ni bcwo/  byor kyis ga na sa chu po ma ma dpa' sem dpa chen po gang dag shes pa ro tu phyin pa
181b6(khri brgyad): mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rtags rnams dang / rnam sha mtshan ma rnam pa dang / rang bzhin du 'gyur ba tu sha pa de nad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ra
181b7(khri brgyad): byang chub po mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa 'i mi sa rtso bde kun dod chags pa la bas/ dben pa'i rang zhin can dang/ zhe sang dag ti zhugapas pas byen pa'i sa hrI/ 
181b8(khri brgyad): can du 'gyur ro// rangab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ros rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de sdang dang / gti mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i ras
182a1(khri brgyad): can du 'gyur ro// ngag kyang de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dacan pa'i rang bayin can du 'gyur ro/ narab byor byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' can po dag 'i nasang dang / gti yug gi mnanam
182a2(khri brgyad): de de pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab sde pa rol tu phyin pa zab pa 'di rtog par gyur pa de dag de ma
182a3(khri brgyad): tshul can du 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bza' po 'di rtogs pa de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad
182a4(khri brgyad): ba skyed kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi rten lag
182a5(khri brgyad): bco ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhinate/ de de bzhin no// rab sbyor byang bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes ba gyi tu sbyin papa po di y-i pa da ninam patha
182a6(khri brgyad): banyid kyi tshul can yin pas sems cad tham sa cad kyi rten yin no// rab byer gyis gsol pa/ ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dra 'i 'di lta ba 6/ zhes sems ldan rnams
182a7(khri brgyad): rgya chub se dpa ses dpa chen ga / ga mas ya sa dpopa tshan gras byen tshan ringan pa da nga nga pa me //  kyi bya chu sa
182b1(khri brgyad): si 'as 'a chen po'i goH de de gzugs dang khrel ba ma yin no// da ci'i bya shan/ rab 'byung gzugs dang bya chub sems dpa'i gamag ta med pa'i phyir te/ de bas na go ca de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin ma zhes bya'o// 
182b2(khri brgyad): ba 'byor bo ni tsheng ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed nams dang dad bar shes pa dang bral pa bsrid do// de ci'i phyir den/ ra'atho dus par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gocha gtad ba ba'i phyi ste/ ra 'byor de bsan no 'i
182b3(khri brgyad): sems can dang srog dang skye po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / dang zag dang shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed dang po dang / cho
182b4(khri brgyad): slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / 'brel pa ma yin no// rab 'byor go chad ni dam thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba pa yin de// de'i phyir nem/ rab babyor nas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtar med pa/ 
182b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gom gtan me ci'i mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ debar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go mede ni rnab banam pa cang btsun pa nyid kyib dang 'brel ba ma yin no// rab 'byor rgya shes rab kyi 'arom
182b6(khri brgyad): bzo po de bstod pa gang dag gi ltar bdag cag sas sems cad rnams cad la tsas ma las zla bar bya'o// zhes dos 'gob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po na ni chom pam sacad
182b7(khri brgyad): bgrel ba ma yin no// rang 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bya bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams cad yongs su su ngan las bzla bar bya'o// zhes go cha 'tshal ba de ni nyan thos kyi
182b8(khri brgyad): 'am nga sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su mi chi bar 'tshal par bgyis so bcom ldan 'das 'di gnas ma mchis shing gag lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams
183a1(khri brgyad): // yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o nas de ltar gos 'tshal ba de nyan thos kyis 'ag rang sangs rgyas kyis ltung ba den gnas mam ches lags so// de'i slad du na/ byang bachub sams dpa
183a2(khri brgyad): da 'an bo pas nis bcams pasub s+ho/ sems can rnams kyi cher dugo na 'tshal 'ayalags pa'i slad du'o// des sa pa gas la pa dang / bane lung das kyis po dang ldan par 'byor 'disas
183a3(khri brgyad): la to// rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du/ byang chub sa pas dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
183a4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis las gnas gcig tu mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bya ba chub sems dpa' sems deb cher po ni phyogs
183a5(khri brgyad): sems cad rnams kyi slad du gacha 'tshal pa pa lags kyi bcom ldan 'das snang chub sems dpa' skabs dpa chen po nas pas can thams cad yo suM pra na las bzla ba'i srang du ga lnga lA ba lag so/ 
183a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa tshan napa pa rnams cad ma byed pa nyid kyi mi zhes kyi nga dug tshal ba lags so// com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga byed de bzhin no// dede bzhin
183a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rlabs kyi phyir gro cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems cad thams cad yongs su bya
183a8(khri brgyad): las thab dang / rnam pathams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi la shes kyi phyir goca bgos pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pa mos khyen pa de za ba lags te/ de ni sus kyang
183b1(khri brgyad): bsgom par bgyi pha lpags/ gang du yang bsgom bar ba phye lam lags/ dgar yang bsrem byar bgyi bam lags so// deci'i slad du nan/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha don tu phyin pa zab po 'di pa ni grang bsgom ba dang / ka
183b2(khri brgyad): la pa dag / gang gis sleb pa tshe sa 'gal bangs du thub pa yang medam byas te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gas rab kyil ba tu sbyin pa skam pa den nam ma 'a bsgom pa lags so 'dres s+t+wa~M/ shes
183b3(khri brgyad): nichos thams cad ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslob pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
183b4(khri brgyad): re la tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta skye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskor pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par 'jig ba lags so// btsam
183b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'de lta ste/ shes rab kyi ba rlos te phyin pa bsgom pa degang bsgom brda' bar 'jig pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgo/ 
183b6(khri brgyad): pade de gzugs bsngom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di na ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgos pa de na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dpa' byed nams dang / rnam par shis pa bsgom parnam par 'dzeg
183b7(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni bdag bsgom pa rdab bar 'jig pa lags so// ma ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pasngob pa doni/ shes pa po dang
183b8(khri brgyad): mthong ba ba'i bangar du bsgol pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dil ste zhes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bsgob pa de 'i sbyin pa'i pha rol na phyin pa bsgom pa na bar 'jig pa lags so// de bzhinadu
184a1(khri brgyad): / ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgob pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi bsgom ba rnam par 'jig pa lags so bcom ldan 'das 'dril ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
184a2(khri brgyad): babasgob pa di dang stong ba nyid bsgrib pa rnab par 'jig pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngob nyid stong pa nyid kyi rlo pa bu ga ga pa ma com ldan 'das 'di ste sti shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba
184a3(khri brgyad): / dradra banye bar bzhag pa bslab ba rnam par 'jig pa lags so// 'di b+ha ste zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkeng ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi lan lag
184a4(khri brgyad): ma bsgom brdab par 'jig pa lags so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni spobs bcu bslob brnam par 'jig pa lags so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mi
184a5(khri brgyad): bdang / so so yang dag par reg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom bA rnapA par 'jig pa lags so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig
184a6(khri brgyad): lags so// 'di ltaste shes rab kyi pha ro la khyen pa bslob pa de des cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir po 'ong ba'i bras bu dang dgra bcol ba nyid dang/ rang bya badrub dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas rnam
184a7(khri brgyad): cab ba byen pa nyid kyi par du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga rab 'byor deng bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rar tu phyir ba ba stsal la de rigs
184a8(khri brgyad): bsgom pa nas par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du s+yA te/ 'di sa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa 'i sgom pa don rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par ringag yin// @
184b1(khri brgyad): bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par ma gyur ta ba zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa
184b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kha rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzangad pa'i ma ro tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi ba dang ste
184b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cheb
184b4(khri brgyad): rkyen po yongs su brtag par byaste/ ci bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa ma sa da pa stan pa nyid la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tAd+ha pa/ tsi mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as pas
184b5(khri brgyad): bo gis rab kyi pharalatu phyin pa rang po 'dis spyod pa de ni gzhan gyis smras pa dang gzhan gyis bstan pal snying bang sngal pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
184b6(khri brgyad): kosas spyod pa de gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro lab/ ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thab po 'dis spyod pa de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis
184b7(khri brgyad): mi 'azlog sa sa la zhe srang dang / gti phug dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrogs sa pa/ ci phyi 'i ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems depa ma chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zatho pa 'di sa ts+tsha
184b8(khri brgyad): bde nyid pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / dul sems kyi pha rol tu phyir ba dang / bzod pa'i sa rol tu phyin pa dang / btsod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bamam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi 'dos tu phyin pa da
185a1(khri brgyad): / zab par ma gyur ta thA/ ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la smod ba dra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa za' po 'di ston pa ma ri Sh+TAn/ 
185a2(khri brgyad): ngam sa 'i chung la/ zha ma bye na/ de yi kyi ga 'i /  ma lag
185a3(khri brgyad): kyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la mngon par dga' 'am/ thos nas kyang 'dzin tas/ 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed dpa/ de bzhin nyid dunan tan byed dam
185a4(khri brgyad): zhes brtag par bya'o/ kha khyor byer mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sngon gyi dus na yang shesu rab kyi pha rol tu phyir bza' po 'di yo yu drA ba byas pa dang / bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / 
185a5(khri brgyad): grags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di
185a6(khri brgyad): sbyin par/ gi skrag mi dang dngang ba mi 'bru ba dang / zhum par mi 'gyur gong bar mi 'gyur te/ yed phyer ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i phreng du ces nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 
185a7(khri brgyad): kha bzhin yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom lar 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'ang ston par/ ma smag pa dang dang bar mi 'gyur
185a8(khri brgyad): ning / zhum par ba 'gyur 'gong bar mi 'gyur te de'i yid phyir phyogs par ya pami 'gyur ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
185b1(khri brgyad): deltar rnam par dbyang bar bgyi/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba beras kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gdol pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
185b2(khri brgyad): byin pa zab lo 'di sa nub par dasta bar bya grorab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnab pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid la gnol pas/ shes
185b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lnga ji ltar rnam par byung bar bgyi ma ldan 'das kyis bka' snrel gar dwa byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po'i sems kyi rnyed stong ba nyid la ga'ol pa dang / 
185b4(khri brgyad): nyid la 'bab pa dang / stong pa nyid la bab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no// rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud 'tshan pa med pa gzhob pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi
185b5(khri brgyad): danam yab la gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor sems kyi rgud skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi rgyud de bzhin
185b6(khri brgyad): da dang chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag par mtha' da mnyas pa nyid dang / ma kyin kyi khya ba dang / man pa byed pa meng sa le gzho la gas bes kyi yo phyin pa zal po 'di sa rnam par byod pa yid to/ 
185b7(khri brgyad): drud zil ba lta bu la gzhol ba dang / sprul ba lta bu gzhos pas / sa rab kyi pha rol na phyidan pa zab mo 'dis rnam par sbyong ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bya 'dub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po rnams
185b8(khri brgyad): kyims kyi rgyu stong pa nyid pa gdo bas/ shes rab kye sa tu phyin pa rgya dun lan pa la myod zhes sa kyi ba ras bya btub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi spyad mil pa lta bu'i bar la gzho las/ 
186a1(khri brgyad): // shesar rabakyil ro phyin pa 'ab po 'dis rab par rtsod pa yin no// zhes pag yul na/ bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa sa chen po/ gzugs la yang dab par pyod babacing pa
186a2(khri brgyad): sal/ sor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnabs dang / rngab par shes pa yang rnab par dpyod par bgyi dalags sa pa/ de bzhin du rnam pathams cadas byed pa nyid kyi bar sa yang rnam par spyod pa bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan das
186a3(khri brgyad): dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbugs la rnam par pyod par mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rnabam par dpyod par mi byed do// 
186a4(khri brgyad): te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab bathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'drar bar dpyod par mi byed do/ ci'i bye ba ni / rab 'byor 'di ltang dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus pa
186a5(khri brgyad): snang ba ma phyag dang ras kya ma 'ong ba/ gang dul la ma so/ gang mang mi 'dug pa/ yul da yang mi gnas/ phyogs na yang mi gnas te/ de 'di tha dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i dmigs la/ gang sa grangs dang / 'o ba dag 'acwa
186a6(khri brgyad): pami dmigs pa ni lus kya ba bangon par rdzogs par byang chub par mings te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dpas dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brjod grus
186a7(khri brgyad): dang / bsapa gtan dang / shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de tsi phyir zhen/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin
186a8(khri brgyad): ba dang tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnab par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir nin/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dag nab ra
186b1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang ben pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig go// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams dad ma khyer pa nyid
186b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid kar len pa 'dri ni de bzhin nyid gcig go// de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang sdeb pa dang mi 'jigs pa dang / 
186b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhid nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin no// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chas la 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
186b4(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las 'dod chags 'dul ba'i lelu nas bya ste ba'i bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum nurtsa drug la des
186b5(khri brgyad): ngan spong pa dang / gzugs na skrong pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i tsan+dan gyi byem blangs shing / lha'i me tod uta pa la dang / kumu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba logs su gtor ro// gter nas
186b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gal ba der dang sde lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyog sa gcig tul bad de// phyogs gcig tul bod nas kyang 'dod pan spong ba dang / gzugs na sbeng pa'i rje'i bu dang gis
186b7(khri brgyad): lda 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa babam 'di las 'ang slad du gzugs nyid
186b8(khri brgyad): sa cad la byed pa nyid bes pa/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa nyid kyang gzugs// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nams dang / dam par shes pa nyid kyang rnal pa thams cad mkhyen pa da yin la/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyang / 
187a1(khri brgyad): / rnam par shes pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad bakhyan pa nyid kyid bzhin te dag payin pa'i di 'azhin nyid de ni gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyed med / 
187a2(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbya te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar gyi de brji ti gang yin pa dang / rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ga yin pa ni gcig ste/ gnyis du me gnyis su dbang re de// des stor par
187a3(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtag par dka' ste/ brtag pa nus shing rtog ge'i spyod par lags la/ di bzhis ze brtaga' pa'i mkhas pa dnga'ang
187a4(khri brgyad): / dge ba lags te 'jig rten thams cad dang pi mthun pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pan spod pa dang / gzug pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnabasal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu
187a5(khri brgyad): deyinado// de bzhin te/ lcu'i bu dag gzugs nyi rnab pa thams cad pa khyen pa nyid de/ ram pa thams cad khyed pa nyid kyang gzugs so// dang nen du ba dpa/ 'dushes dang / 'du byed rnams dag rnam par shes pa kyi
187a6(khri brgyad): ma pa rnams cad pa ldan pa sbed de/ rnal pa thams cadas khyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// de zhen du phyur te/ sangs rgyas sde bar nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad 'byar ba nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyang ma
187a7(khri brgyad): so// gzugs kyid du ni bye ka / yin pa dang / rab bzugs cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'din kyang 'a yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dri gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis sa dbyad med do// de bzhin du skur tes pa
187a8(khri brgyad): byed pani da ga me ga na pa pa ma das byen pa ted byed pazhin da ga 'i dzin kyid ba / sa ci nyis sung byer da/ da pyod dag shegs pa ga da gnag
187b1(khri brgyad): ga y+r-in las chung du ma thugs gan // chas bstan pa la gzhal ba la yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye ma 'di sa ste/ de bzhir gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab cir mthang bar dga' ma rtog sa
187b2(khri brgyad): stestoste rtag yinas shing rtog ga'i spong ba yin la/ zhi bzhi pa mo brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing / 
187b3(khri brgyad): dadu bang mngon par rdzogs pade sangs ma rgyas te gang la gnyis kun du rgur med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di bam po lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab par
187b4(khri brgyad): / gyings zang ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' bab pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab po// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba dang / 
187b5(khri brgyad): / sbe pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / mdan par 'du byed pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag zab pa nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba pa'i bar du bab
187b6(khri brgyad): 'di zab bo// d+hi Ta dag gzugs papa pa'i phyir chos 'di za pa// lha'i bu ga tsha ba dang / 'du sa dang / 'ang byed rnams dang / rnam rdzogs pa zab pa'i phyir pos 'di 'o// lha'i bu ga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zang
187b7(khri brgyad): dab dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyi pa'i dbab bo// nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir ces 'di zab po// dngos po med
187b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab po// drad pa nye bar gzhag pa 'ab pa dang / yang dag par ba dag 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang pa dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan la gang / yam sa pa'i phyir
188a1(khri brgyad): chos 'dibag po// spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag pa nasangs mas gyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya gyi bar du bab pa dang rna ra ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du badra nga'i
188a2(khri brgyad): byi/ bu'i bu dag ce mchos 'di rab pa lha'i burnams kyis gsol pa/ bcol ldan padas kyi ma 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i cho sa 'di bstan pags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di
188a3(khri brgyad): gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du yang ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / nam par shes pa bzung ba'i slad du bstan pam ljags mi bzung ba'i slad du la
188a4(khri brgyad): lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du yang ma la gas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 
188a5(khri brgyad): gzung ba'i slad du yang ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa zing mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du yang ba lags/ lan
188a6(khri brgyad): gcig phyir 'ang bya'i 'bras bu dang / byed mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcol pa nyid dang / rang bya ba chu ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i skad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du rang / 
188a7(khri brgyad): mam ga so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ri bdag gis gzugs sa// bdag ni gzugs so// bdag gi tshor ba'o// 'du shes so// 'du byed nams sa// rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni drab par shes pa'o// sang+yas
188a8(khri brgyad): rgyam kyi chos drel ma rgyad kyi me du na du / dag ge nga dzugs thams ni myed thugapa pa'i khri zun pa dag sa na bye la grab zu/ dan
188b1(khri brgyad): cig kyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag gi phyir mI'i nga ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag gi dgra bcol pa nyid do// bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdagi rang byang chub bo// bdag ni rang byang
188b2(khri brgyad): tub // bdag gi rna pa pathams cad ma khyo pa nyid do// bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag du de bzhin no// 
188b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin te/ lnga' bu dag chos de gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yang ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yang ma yin no// meng ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa
188b4(khri brgyad): yang ma yen/ me gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yang ma yin no// lha'i bu dag gang dag gzugs gzung po'i byed byud dang / rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyi par du gzung ba'i phyir skyed pa de dag la ni shes rab kyi ba ba tu phye pa
188b5(khri brgyad): bsgom pa'i skal ba med de/ bsam gtan dang brtson 'grus dang babod ba dang / tshul khrims dang / snyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bsgom par mi nus so// rab pa thabs cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so// 
188b6(khri brgyad): ya 'byor kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan nga 'tshas 'di ni chos thams cad dang 'thun pa lags te/ chos ni chos gang ga dang mthun pa lags she na/ dzid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa lags so// ba
188b7(khri brgyad): ldan das chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rab tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pa rlob tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bang dang 'thun pa lags so// 
188b8(khri brgyad): ma ldan 'das chos 'di ni dang stong pa nyid dang 'thud pa lags so// bcom ldan 'ad ches 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngabo nyid stong ba nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyer
189a1(khri brgyad): / pa nyid kyi pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ cil thogs pa ma mchis pa lags nam/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags// tshangs/ 
189a2(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad la khyen pa nyid kyi bar la grags pa ma mchis pa lags so// chos 'di ni nam mkha'
189a3(khri brgyad): dadang de bzhi dmanyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings panyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa med pa dang smon pa med
189a4(khri brgyad): pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnas par bang pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid
189a5(khri brgyad): lags so// chos 'di ni gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag par mchis pa dang / char ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang de bzhin num pa
189a6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye bo ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pas mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa lags so// chos 'di ni gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
189a7(khri brgyad): dang dam pa shes pa'i gzhi dmigs sus mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs bu ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhi ma mchis pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal
189a8(khri brgyad): pan spyod pa dang / gzugasar rjod pa'i lha'i dre dag gis 'di skad ces gsol tog bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su su~Ms pa lags sa// de ci'i slad du zhen/ de ltar gnas patanas
189b1(khri brgyad): bya da kyi ston pa dathams cad sbya pa nyid ngarnalas brtsamasaH/ kun pabaskad du'o// des tshe dang ldan par 'a byang sa 'dod pa na myod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lnga'i budu dag la 'don ces smrab / 
189b2(khri brgyad): kAng 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes skyes pa lags so// zhes smras pa ni ji lta rjes su skyes pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes
189b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma 'ong se ma song ba ste/ de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang pa 'ong ma song ba ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dzang
189b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa yidzin dzin na kyi ga zhin thams ca da / chos ma med na yi y-i/ mthan na na
189b5(khri brgyad): shegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yi no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i da seMn byed dri myur bdas pa ni dug sa brgya dang 'byong gnas pa de bzhin pa shegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// k+sha de bzhin gshegs pa'i dra bani
189b6(khri brgyad): sku ba med na par rtog / pa med pa de bzhin du banas partan dang 'byor byed bzhin nyid kyang 'gyu ba med cing / rnam por rtog pa med la de ltar bzhin gshegs pa'o bzhin nyid ga la la thogs pa ma pa de bzhi dus
189b7(khri brgyad): mas cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang dgu la yang thogs pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rji snyen nyid gang smin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi shin ted dgang rin bu ni gnyis su ma da gnyis du bye med do// de bzhin nyid
189b8(khri brgyad): nes byas pa ste// de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid dum gyur pa yang med / gang gi byid de nin nyid dgang gi debazhin nyid du mabyung ba yar med cing / nam pang de nan nyid du sa srung ba ma yin pa de'i phyir// de bzhin nyid de nig kyi
190a1(khri brgyad): med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ltar na gnas brtad rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don thams cad du 'gyur ba med
190a2(khri brgyad): nam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tham sa cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid pa ma dad pa phyi med pa
190a3(khri brgyad): bu med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmigs su med pa'o// de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na
190a4(khri brgyad): brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid bang ban 'din ci thams cad bye bzhin nyid pam bu na pa sa par te/ ches rnam lda kyi de pazhin nyid las sung
190a5(khri brgyad): rabod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing dron rtag te de bzhin nyid do// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
190a6(khri brgyad): rjes bu skyes kyang gang du yang skyes pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'dus pa ma yin ma 'das pa ma yin/ de ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa sa
190a7(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gnas btAn rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yim/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba yang mkhyen te/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
190a8(khri brgyad): rjes su skyes pa nas bya'o// lha'i bu dag 'dil 'das pa'i de bzhin te mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi
190b1(khri brgyad): na1/  sa man sa rgya bas 'dan da pa shA da/  sgru shA byas
190b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de ltar bung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa med kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de banan nyi mnyam pa byed do// de nin gshegs bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de ltar byung ba'i da
190b3(khri brgyad): nyid ma rnam pa da// de myur du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin dashegs pa'i da zhin cid de ni gnyim su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// gzugs kyi de pa'in nyid kyis de bzhinan/ 
190b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyi sa zhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid cig zags byed bzhin tad do// de bzhin dunas dang du byed dmas dang rnam pa nas pa de bzhin nyid pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
190b5(khri brgyad): / de shin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor bu dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de p+ta gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye ba dbras dang / rna
190b6(khri brgyad): te nga / de bA ga gas pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gci su su med de/  srur bye med do// de shin dun slong zhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zini nyid 'i ni gshegs pa
190b7(khri brgyad): dzin nyid kyis bdag gis de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin du shes pa po dang mthong po nga myed bzhin nyid kyis de la ra gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhin nyid kyis shes pa po dag / mthong ba pa'i nga rje
190b8(khri brgyad): nyis/  na ni na sa pa 'i yad ya 'i ni gas sa pa kyi sa/ 
191a1(khri brgyad): / bzhin nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtsod 'grupa dang / bam gtan dang / shes rab gyikyi rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin rnyed dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i da bzhin nyid de na gnyis sum da gnyis su
191a2(khri brgyad): / nga thongs te med pa ni nyid dang / de sa ma pa da sa nyid kyib kyi bzhin kyang dang / deban da gsheg pa pa'i na dan nyis su med dag nyes su myed med pa/  pa bar bzhag pa'i dus
191a3(khri brgyad): lang dag par spong ba dang / rdu bal gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ma gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bani na gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid don gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// 
191a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / yi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
191a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do// de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de
191a6(khri brgyad): nga kya med de// lha bu dag de bzhin gshegs papa yang dag pa bathen cing 'dil brteldan pa/ blan med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs pa sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes byab
191a7(khri brgyad): ngagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'phrul to// g.yos rab tu g.yos kun du rab tu g.yos so// ldeg ra
191a8(khri brgyad): du ga so// ma chem ra rgya mchog/ kun du rgya mam che pa// yu yu la tha lums pa du bsul khri ma/ 'azugs lasu 'thugs kyi thugapas// phyogs na tu phyogs
191b1(khri brgyad): grogs sa thon nur phyogs dpa'o// byang kyogs mthon mo phyogs dam 'o/ so phyogs mnor byang phyags dpa'o/ mthar mthon dbus dpa/ dbus ma thon mtha' dpa'o// de nas 'dub spyod pa dang / gzugs dbyang
191b2(khri brgyad): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan dpa' gyur la lta mun gyi phye ma dag gis ga da/ mngon pa dag to/ mngon par sa can napa/ 'di gad ces pacom ldan 'das 'a sa da das na dpang pod 'as
191b3(khri brgyad): gas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su smos pa ni mtshar lags so zhes tshig tu brjod de// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ lhar bu de dag gi pi ta ma de nyid kyi rgyud nas pa
191b4(khri brgyad): sa so// lnga'i bu dag 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes sum skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes pum skyes so// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid cirjes su ma skyes gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan
191b5(khri brgyad): sa so// char ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes so// rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes sus skyes so// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i ngeng
191b6(khri brgyad): nan gyi rjes sum skyes sa// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnas pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi bar kyings susu skyes/ nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes sum skyes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bye
191b7(khri brgyad): sa sum skyes/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su mi skyes so// 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su
191b8(khri brgyad): 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus ma byas kyirjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyeso// 'dus sa byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi
192a1(khri brgyad): / bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyeso// de ba'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis rjes su sred pa dang / gang rjes su skye ba'i chos de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
192a2(khri brgyad): po lu 'di skad ces gso to// tsamam ldan 'das de bzhin dang / mnong pa bzhin nyi dang / gzhan pa yin pa de bzhin nyid / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dge/ chos skyon med pas
192a3(khri brgyad): lhag pa 'gyur/ de la ni che ba dang / 'dushes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / nam patsho shes pa mi ngos gas rnas par shes pa di bzhin byed mi dmigs te/ nam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
192a4(khri brgyad): ba ltag la 'gras/ de bzhin du byung ste/ de la rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bar mi dmigs/ rnam pa mas ma thun pa nyid kyi bzhi nyid mi das gus te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigasas
192a5(khri brgyad): thamasas ma ldan pa nyid me bzhin nyid migs lda kAl 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ shA ri'i de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni zabs ste/ de lag rnag migs
192a6(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmags te/ gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs pa yA pa gyur/ de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam pa
192a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par mug la 'gyur/ de bzhin du skur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ nas pa
192b1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid dang / mnor
192b2(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol la// dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la ches kyi mig rdul med cing drim
192b3(khri brgyad): bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug bcu ni len pa med par zag pa rnams pas sems rnam par grol
192b4(khri brgyad): 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgyal bsnyen bkur byas te/ thams cad du smin pa byin tshul khrims bsrur/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bskyed/ shes rab bsgom
192b5(khri brgyad): de dag thes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs sum zin cing / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pas/ 'di ltar spyad de/ 'di ni srin pa'o 'di la smin par bya'o// bdag par tshub khrims 'di bsrung ngo // bzod pa 'di bskam
192b6(khri brgyad): 'grus 'a sdom mo// bsam gtan 'dil snyoms par 'dug par bya'o// zhes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o snyam du ltar spod pa de dag shes rab kyi pa tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma yin pa sa/ 
192b7(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab bsgom zhing de dag 'du shes sna tshogs la spyod pas tha dad pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
192b8(khri brgyad): kyang la yis sa la ma tu thu la /  ma 'og/  bas sa ma ya sa
193a1(khri brgyad): // dag/ mtshan pa med par ba/ smon pa med pa yod med kyi de dag shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma byin na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas/ nyan thos
193a2(khri brgyad): sam rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// shA ri 'bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis par chos de dag nyid la bsgoms su 'dra yang thabs la mkhas pa da
193a3(khri brgyad): dag yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon bum du bgyis nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyasu 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan par mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa
